catentdesc.name: Borsati Fife Dress Loafer
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black slip-on dress shoe in a wide fit
catentdesc.longdescription: Unbeatable comfort in a loafer with twin gore sides for a custom fit. Exhaust vents keep your feet dry and comfortable.

catentdesc.name: Leo Currency Dress Shoe
catentdesc.shortdescription: Slip-on shoe in aged Cognac leather
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic dress shoe features a bicycle toe and micro-thin twin gores for comfort. Black stitch detail adds pizzazz to the all-leather upper.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Morse Full Brogue
catentdesc.shortdescription: Single-hue wingtip oxfords with toe cap
catentdesc.longdescription: Tradition meets style in this sharp-looking shoe. The memory foam insole provides comfort all day.

catentdesc.name: Meso Brico Oxford
catentdesc.shortdescription: The classic oxford in a sleek design
catentdesc.longdescription: This elegant shoe is the race car version of the classic oxford dress shoe. Features a lace-up front and padded insole. Suitable for high arches.

catentdesc.name: Baril Sidestep Oxford
catentdesc.shortdescription: Rich tan leather shoe with dark stitching
catentdesc.longdescription: Make a statement in these chic oxfords with a touch of vertical stitching. Great for the office or a night out.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Wicker Oxford
catentdesc.shortdescription: A dressed-up oxford with exotic leather lacing
catentdesc.longdescription: These oxfords have laced leather detailing in the upper, providing style, comfort, and ventilation. Rounded toe and cushioned suede insole.

catentdesc.name: Leo Christopher Oxford
catentdesc.shortdescription: A lace-up dress shoe with a flexible sole
catentdesc.longdescription: Diagonal stitching on distressed leather gives these shoes a unique look. Built for comfort, these shoes have a high-tech rubber sole for reduced shock and better traction.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Lo-top Canvas Sneaker
catentdesc.shortdescription: Casual style in a basketball-inspired sneaker
catentdesc.longdescription: Great with jeans or chinos, these sneakers will take you wherever you want to go. With a canvas upper and classic white rubber toe.

catentdesc.name: Meso Earth Fire Sneaker
catentdesc.shortdescription: A trendy casual shoe built for comfort
catentdesc.longdescription: The upper combines perforated and smooth tan leather, with a lace-up closure. Features a rubber sole and padded insole.

catentdesc.name: Baril Goforit Sport Shoe
catentdesc.shortdescription: An athletic shoe with style to spare
catentdesc.longdescription: With Italian-inspired styling, this sneaker looks great on or off the court. Offers a breathable upper and a cushioned collar for extra support.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Suede Hi-top
catentdesc.longdescription: A great-looking shoe that goes with everything. Features a soft, quilted suede upper, and breathable memory foam insole.

catentdesc.name: Leo Toner Walking Shoes
catentdesc.shortdescription: Tone while you walk with these ultra-comfortable shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Walk circles around your mates with these high-end walking shoes. Balance-ball-like pods keep you in shape with each stride. With a breathable lining and durable rubber outsole.

catentdesc.name: Cassetti Demon Running Shoe
catentdesc.longdescription: These shoes offer comfort, fit, and unbeatable performance. The synthetic mesh upper lets your feet breath while providing all the support you need. Features a washable anti-bacterial liner.

catentdesc.name: Meso Suede Pancake Shoe
catentdesc.longdescription: Nobody will dare to step on these shoes. They look too good. Dance like a king in these super-comfortable suede sneakers.

catentdesc.name: Baril Lo-top Canvas Sneakers
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray denim canvas sneakers with side vents
catentdesc.longdescription: Cool and casual, these sneakers look trendy and feel great. A gray denim canvas upper with classic white rubber toe.
